step1.title: Prepare Mason Jar
step1.text: Clean the mason jar, and put circle stickers on the outside of the jars in a polka dot pattern.

step2.title: Prepare Surface for Spray Painting
step2.text: Set out a large sheet of paper in open area. Then, spray an even coat of paint on mason jar and let them dry.

step3.title: Remove Stickers
step3.text: When the jars are dry to the touch, remove the stickers

step4.title: Make Loops and Wrap Around Jars
step4.text: To create a hanger for the jar, cut a piece of wire of generous length for twisting the wire.One the opposite ends of the wire, twist little loops. Wrap this wire around the mouth of the jar and twist around to secure the wire on the jar.

step5.title: Connect One Side and Make One Side Into a Hook
step5.text: Cut a long piece of wire to connect to the loops of the jar. Make this wire as long as you want your lantern to hang down. Secure one side of the wire to one of the loops, and turn the other end into a hook for easy placement and removal.

step6.title: Hang Lantern on Tree
step6.text: Swing wire over a sturdy limb on a tree and secure the hook into the loop. Add candle and light it. If you are concerned about fire, use a battery operated tea light. EZ
